trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 23rd 2006
Summary: 2 red pulsating lights seen flying in front of house
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my room about to go to bed. i had just closed my eyes when i opened them and looked at the window. Thats when i saw the object.At first i thought it was a plane but then i realized that it was flying in a direction that planes in the area did not. it was also flying extremely low to the ground. it was noticed at the left side of the window and moved quickly to the right.the lights slowly pulsated on and off but the light never fully went away it would only get soft. i watched until it disappeared off the right side of the window then i ran to tell my mom.
